sentences.sContent: Also there is a more sarcastic way, which is not recommended, that is, put a thumbtack into the tire.
sentences.sContent_eng: Also there is a more sarcastic way, which is not recommended, that is, put a thumbtack into the tire.
sentences.sCn: 还有一种更损的方式，不值得推荐，那就是在车胎上按上个图钉。

sentences.sContent: "It was my big hope that people would get [the message] right away and at least put a thumbtack on the map as far as our location, " Buck said.
sentences.sContent_eng: "It was my big hope that people would get [the message] right away and at least put a thumbtack on the map as far as our location, " Buck said.
sentences.sCn: “我最大的愿望是希望人们能够立即收到（这条信息），哪怕在我们所处地方的地图上钉一枚图钉也好。” Buck说。

sentences.sContent: Someone pulls the thumbtack out of the tire, which makes it hard for the owner to find where the hole is.
sentences.sContent_eng: Someone pulls the thumbtack out of the tire, which makes it hard for the owner to find where the hole is.
sentences.sCn: 有人按了图钉再拔下来，这样车主找不到窟窿在哪儿，补胎时更困难。

trans.tranOther: a short pin with a flat top that is used for fixing notices on walls
